    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(float delta)
        Description copied from class: Actor3d
        Updates the actor3d based on time. Typically this is called each frame by Stage3d.act(float).

        The default implementation calls Action3d.act(float) on each action and removes actions that are complete.

        Overrides:
        act in class Actor3d
        Parameters:
        delta - Time in seconds since the last frame.

      • drawChildren

        public void drawChildren(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelBatch modelBatch,
                com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.Environment environment)

      • addActor

        public void addActor(Actor3d actor)
        Adds an actor as a child of this group. The actor is first removed from its parent group, if any.
        See Also:
        Actor3d.remove()

      • removeActor

        public boolean removeActor(Actor3d actor)
        Removes an actor from this group. If the actor will not be used again and has actions, they should be cleared so the actions will be returned to their pool, if any. This is not done automatically.

      • addAction3d

        public void addAction3d(Action3d action)
        Overrides:

        public void clearChildren()

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all children, actions, and listeners from this group.
        Overrides:
        clear in class Actor3d

      • findActor

        public Actor3d findActor(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the first actor found with the specified name. Note this recursively compares the name of every actor in the group.

      • getChildren

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SnapshotArray<Actor3d> getChildren()
        Returns an ordered list of child actors in this group.
